languages.text: "Самыми значительными. За пределами Коронуса мы не только собираем {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}десятину{/g}, но и следим, чтобы каждый мир подчинялся законам Его, и никто не посягал на имперскую власть. Продажные губернаторы, преступные синдикаты, мятежники — ежеминутно какая-то мразь пытается оторвать кусок от Империума. Мы уничтожаем любого, кто дерзнет преступить закон".

"The most significant ones. Beyond the Expanse, the Arbites not only enforce {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}tithe{/g} collection, but also ensure that every planet obeys His Law and that the Imperium's authority remains unchallenged. Corrupt governors, crime syndicates, rebels — not a minute goes by without some parasite trying to take a bite out of the Imperium. We destroy any who dare trespass against the law."
languages.original_text: "Самыми значительными. За пределами Коронуса мы не только собираем {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}десятину{/g}, но и следим, чтобы каждый мир подчинялся законам Его, и никто не посягал на имперскую власть. Продажные губернаторы, преступные синдикаты, мятежники — ежеминутно какая-то мразь пытается оторвать кусок от Империума. Мы уничтожаем любого, кто дерзнет преступить закон".

Corrupt governors, crime syndicates, rebels — not a minute goes by without some parasite trying to take a bite out of the Imperium. We destroy any who dare trespass against the law."

languages.text: 「最も重要なものです。エクスパンスのむこうで、高等裁定局は{g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}租税{/g}の徴収をするだけでなく、すべての惑星が『陛下の法』に従い、帝国の権威が揺らぐことのないよう監視しています。腐敗した総督、犯罪シンジケート、反乱軍…帝国を食い荒らそうとする寄生虫どもは、ひとときも絶えたことはありません。私たちは、法を侵すことを恐れぬ者を、例外なく粛清します」
languages.original_text: "The most significant ones. Beyond the Expanse, the Arbites not only enforce {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}tithe{/g} collection, but also ensure that every planet obeys His Law and that the Imperium's authority remains unchallenged. Corrupt governors, crime syndicates, rebels — not a minute goes by without some parasite trying to take a bite out of the Imperium. We destroy any who dare trespass against the law."

traits.locale_text: 「最も重要なものです。エクスパンスのむこうで、高等裁定局は租税の徴収をするだけでなく、すべての惑星が『陛下の法』に従い、帝国の権威が揺らぐことのないよう監視しています。腐敗した総督、犯罪シンジケート、反乱軍…帝国を食い荒らそうとする寄生虫どもは、ひとときも絶えたことはありません。私たちは、法を侵すことを恐れぬ者を、例外なく粛清します」

languages.text: "Um die wichtigsten. Über die Ausdehnung hinaus erzwingt das Arbites nicht nur die Bezahlung des {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}Zehnts{/g}, sondern sorgt auch dafür, dass alle Planeten Sein Gesetz befolgen und die Autorität des Imperiums unstrittig bleibt. Korrupte Gouverneure, Verbrechersyndikate, Rebellen – es vergeht keine Minute, ohne dass irgendein Parasit versucht, sich einen Teil des Imperiums einzuverleiben. Wir vernichten alle, dies es wagen, das Gesetz zu übertreten."
languages.original_text: "The most significant ones. Beyond the Expanse, the Arbites not only enforce {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}tithe{/g} collection, but also ensure that every planet obeys His Law and that the Imperium's authority remains unchallenged. Corrupt governors, crime syndicates, rebels — not a minute goes by without some parasite trying to take a bite out of the Imperium. We destroy any who dare trespass against the law."

traits.locale_text: "Um die wichtigsten. Über die Ausdehnung hinaus erzwingt das Arbites nicht nur die Bezahlung des Zehnts, sondern sorgt auch dafür, dass alle Planeten Sein Gesetz befolgen und die Autorität des Imperiums unstrittig bleibt. Korrupte Gouverneure, Verbrechersyndikate, Rebellen – es vergeht keine Minute, ohne dass irgendein Parasit versucht, sich einen Teil des Imperiums einzuverleiben. Wir vernichten alle, dies es wagen, das Gesetz zu übertreten."

languages.text: « Des crimes les plus graves. Au-delà des Étendues, l'Arbites ne se contente pas d'assurer la perception de la {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}dîme{/g}, elle se charge également de faire respecter Sa loi afin que l'autorité de l'Imperium ne soit jamais remise en cause. Entre les gouverneurs corrompus, les organisations criminelles et les rébellions... Il ne se passe pas une minute sans que quelqu'un tente de défier la loi de l'Imperium. Et nous sommes là pour empêcher cela. »
languages.original_text: "The most significant ones. Beyond the Expanse, the Arbites not only enforce {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}tithe{/g} collection, but also ensure that every planet obeys His Law and that the Imperium's authority remains unchallenged. Corrupt governors, crime syndicates, rebels — not a minute goes by without some parasite trying to take a bite out of the Imperium. We destroy any who dare trespass against the law."

traits.locale_text: « Des crimes les plus graves. Au-delà des Étendues, l'Arbites ne se contente pas d'assurer la perception de la dîme, elle se charge également de faire respecter Sa loi afin que l'autorité de l'Imperium ne soit jamais remise en cause. Entre les gouverneurs corrompus, les organisations criminelles et les rébellions... Il ne se passe pas une minute sans que quelqu'un tente de défier la loi de l'Imperium. Et nous sommes là pour empêcher cela. »

« Des crimes les plus graves. Au-delà des Étendues, l'Arbites ne se contente pas d'assurer la perception de la {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}dîme{/g}, elle se charge également de faire respecter Sa loi afin que l'autorité de l'Imperium ne soit jamais remise en cause. Entre les gouverneurs corrompus, les organisations criminelles et les rébellions... Il ne se passe pas une minute sans que quelqu'un tente de défier la loi de l'Imperium. Et nous sommes là pour empêcher cela. »

languages.text: «Las más importantes. Más allá de la Extensión, el Arbites no solo recauda los {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}diezmos{/g}, también garantiza que todos los planetas obedecen Sus leyes y que la autoridad del Imperium no se ve socavada. Gobernadores corruptos, crimen organizado, rebeldes... no pasa un solo minuto sin que algún parásito intente darle una dentellada al Imperium. Erradicamos a todos los que osan infringir la ley».
languages.original_text: "The most significant ones. Beyond the Expanse, the Arbites not only enforce {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}tithe{/g} collection, but also ensure that every planet obeys His Law and that the Imperium's authority remains unchallenged. Corrupt governors, crime syndicates, rebels — not a minute goes by without some parasite trying to take a bite out of the Imperium. We destroy any who dare trespass against the law."

traits.locale_text: «Las más importantes. Más allá de la Extensión, el Arbites no solo recauda los diezmos, también garantiza que todos los planetas obedecen Sus leyes y que la autoridad del Imperium no se ve socavada. Gobernadores corruptos, crimen organizado, rebeldes... no pasa un solo minuto sin que algún parásito intente darle una dentellada al Imperium. Erradicamos a todos los que osan infringir la ley».

languages.text: “情节最严重的那部分。在科罗努斯扩区之外，法务官不仅要负责征收什一{g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}税{/g}，还要确保每颗行星都遵守神皇的律法，确保没人胆敢挑战帝国的权威。那些腐败的总督、犯罪集团、叛乱分子……每时每刻都会有无数蛀虫打算侵蚀帝国的利益，而我们负责消灭一切不法分子。”
languages.original_text: "The most significant ones. Beyond the Expanse, the Arbites not only enforce {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}tithe{/g} collection, but also ensure that every planet obeys His Law and that the Imperium's authority remains unchallenged. Corrupt governors, crime syndicates, rebels — not a minute goes by without some parasite trying to take a bite out of the Imperium. We destroy any who dare trespass against the law."

traits.locale_text: “情节最严重的那部分。在科罗努斯扩区之外，法务官不仅要负责征收什一税，还要确保每颗行星都遵守神皇的律法，确保没人胆敢挑战帝国的权威。那些腐败的总督、犯罪集团、叛乱分子……每时每刻都会有无数蛀虫打算侵蚀帝国的利益，而我们负责消灭一切不法分子。”

languages.text: "En önemlileriyle. Enginlik'in ötesinde Yargıcılar; yalnızca {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}aşar{/g} toplama işini infaz etmekle kalmaz, aynı zamanda her gezegenin O'nun Yasası'na uygun hareket etmesini ve İmparatorluk'un otoritesinin sorgulanamaz kalmasını sağlarlar. Yoz valiler, suç şebekeleri, isyancılar... İmparatorluk'tan bir pay almaya çalışan asalaklar olmadan bir dakika bile geçmez. Yasaya karşı gelmeye cüret eden herkesi yok ederiz."
languages.original_text: "The most significant ones. Beyond the Expanse, the Arbites not only enforce {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}tithe{/g} collection, but also ensure that every planet obeys His Law and that the Imperium's authority remains unchallenged. Corrupt governors, crime syndicates, rebels — not a minute goes by without some parasite trying to take a bite out of the Imperium. We destroy any who dare trespass against the law."
